paragraph.paragraph: EiffelStudio editor offers the possibility to indent or unindent selected lines.

item.paragraph:
The "Indent" command corresponds to the Indent selection entry in the Advanced sub menu of the
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml
Edit Menu
. It may be called by using the keyboard shortcut "Tab". Its action is to insert a tabulation in front of each
../20_selection.xml selected line.

The "Unindent" command corresponds to the Unindent selection entry in the Advanced sub menu of the
../80_edit_menu_commands.xml
Edit Menu
. It may be called by using the keyboard shortcut "Shift+Tab". Its action is to remove the tabulation in front of each
../20_selection.xml selected line if there is such a character.

paragraph.note: Note: If there is no selection, you may still use the unindent shortcut "Shift+Tab". The command will be applied to the current line.
